name: Complete
description: Completed series with English translation, official or not doesn't matter as long as the series is completed with English fully translated.

name: Ongoing
description: Series that have a running English translation. If the English translation stopped but the raws is still ongoing, it's going to fall under the Unknown status.

name: Hiatus
description:
Series currently on break. Typically for reasons like:
-- Season end or break
-- Author or artist health break

name: Axed
description:
Series who unfortunately got hit by Kratos. Either the raws got:
-- Cancelled
-- Discontinued

name: Unknown
description:
English translation are stopped for various reasons like:
-- Scanlator/s dropped the series for reasons
-- No updates for atleast 6 months from the scanlator
-- No new group have picked up the series
-- DMCA strike
